channel.title: Anyone Got A Skill Idea?
channel.description:
I want to make a skill, I just don't know of what...
Feel Free To Post Your Ideas Here! :D

item.title: Anyone Got A Skill Idea?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

I got a few ideas.

  1. You could refine some already existing skills (most in private servers are not at all like runescape).
  2. Money crafting/smithing (gold bar + hammer + anvil = 25 coins per bar).
  3. Armor Trimming (silk + swamp tar + gold leaf = gold trimmed)
  4. Kite Making (plank + silk + string + dye color = kite) // would be VERY hard to do

-Alexia | Creds please if you use my ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Got A Skill Idea?
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Hmm

  1. keycrafting
  2. phat dyeing (already made)
  3. construction (already made)
  4. hunting (already made)
  5. gem cutting (already made)
  6. barrow smithing (so you can use the silver bars for another job)
  7. Stiching (make villager stuff and that)
  8. LOL money making LOL

Dunno this will be good for people who wanna make a skill. Try keep it up and put a list. Wait wouldn’t that go in another forum oh well.
